title: Buying Boosts then getting banned
body: So the update just came out for the new runes and such... so i go along and buy some RP and go 2, 7 day XP Boosts... for the new infinite level system.... two games later i get a notification telling me im banned for 2 weeks.... already pretty mad i look at the chat review.... and i noticed it was from a game where i died once because i was away attending to my crying sister... next thing i and bombarded by loads of toxic comments by my whole team calling my plenty of names. so i tell them what i was doing (not being toxic at all)! then one of em goes along to say things like 'oh is your sister hot' along with many other sexual comments... which to me just really put me on the deep and.... because she is only 6 years old and had just come out of the hospital AFTER KEYHOLE SURGERY!!!!!!!!! i was attending to her because she was having pains and well obviously im not gonna play a game over helping my sister... so anyway i looked at the chat review some more and well... i was not toxic at all????? the worst thing i said was 'are you kidding me'? so here i am short of a handful of Money that i spent on something i cant even bloody use.... FLAWED AS HELL RIOT THANKS ALOT

replies.body:
I can't really say anything since you haven't posted your chat logs, but one game won't get you perma-banned. It's something you would have had to have done on multiple occasions.

If you feel you have truly been unjustly punished, submit a ticket ( https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ). Don't just complain and plead, give them factual evidence and treat the Rioters on the other side with respect.

Naturally, next time just */mute all*. All you had to say was "Sorry, had to take care of my sister; she just came back from hospital" and LEAVE IT AT THAT. Did they lewd your sister? Mute them. How does what they're typing in chat impact your or your sister's lives?

I hope this helps :) I wish you and your sister (hope she has a speedy recovery â¤) all the best :D

unfortunately I have to disagree with you there.

I went straight to a tier 3 for telling someone to neck themselves. There was no escalation of punishment, no warning, no steps through the tiers - just straight to tier 3.

>

I was responding to 
> but one game won't get you perma-banned


as my interpretation of your comment is that the OP must have had warnings etc before getting to this point.

What I was communicating is that 1 report can get you a 2 week suspension with no escalations through tier 1 and 2. I used to believe that it was always the fault of the offender because they would have had a series of warnings through the punishment tiers before a tier 3 or 4. What I have experienced is not the case.

That said, his response to your comment was a bit douchey.
WOW YEA THAT REALLY HELPED ME GET MY FKN MONEY BACK IM FUKIN DONE
... Sure, use the language that got you banned on someone trying to help. Don't need to see the chat logs. Clearly you deserved the ban.

Why the hell would you talk about your sister in the first place?
You opened the door, deal with it.
